meaningMnemonic: It <kanji>revolve</kanji>s then <kanji>capsize</kanji>s. When a ship revolves onto its back and then capsizes, this causes <vocabulary>capsizing</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the rendaku.
